title: What is the interpretation of washing clothes in a dream for a single, married or pregnant woman?

preview.html: Why washing clothes in a dream completely, like seeing clothes completely washed in a dream, means goodness and repentance, as well as washing away sins, like seeing clothes washed in a dream is completely different from one person to another, as we have. I collect for you all the interpretations related to seeing clothes being completely washed in a dream. Sleep We also provide you with the interpretations of the greatest scholars who interpret visions and dreams in the world, and you will follow in this article the interpretation of the dream of washing clothes for women and men for married people, the elderly and pregnant women. What is the dream of washing clothes? Al-Nabulsi, who is one of the prominent scholars in dream interpretation, indicates to us that seeing the complete washing of clothes in... The dream testifies that the dreamer is comforted by all the followers who passed by him throughout the period he passed. . . With him, and God knows best. As Ibn Sirin explains, seeing complete ablution in a dream means the end of problems and disputes and atonement for his sins and mistakes, and God knows best. However, Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing the dreamer washing clothes in a dream indicates a new life free of disputes and problems, far from Who causes him problems and difficulties, and God knows best. Why does a single woman dream of washing clothes? Prominent academic interpreters say that dreaming of a single girl washing clothes indicates that she is forever thinking about her life and her affairs. These matters may relate to marriage to a man, and God knows best. Seeing dirty clothes in a dream for a single woman is evidence of her followers, problems, and inability to meet her needs, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees that she is washing a stranger’s clothes and not her own, this indicates the benefits that will accrue to her. Seeing washing Bad clothes in a woman’s dream indicate goodness, victory, and closeness, and God knows best. See also: Why do men and women dream of cutting clothes in a dream? Interpretation of seeing a married woman washing clothes. It is also said that the sight of a married woman washing her children’s clothes herself indicates the goodness of her children and the improvement of her life. It is referred to as Washing eggs and placing them in a full dream for a married woman testifies to love, tenderness and psychological comfort in her marriage, and God knows best. Seeing her in a dream full of washing her husband’s clothes indicates the existence of a good relationship between them as well as love and intimate relationship between the spouses. The fact that a woman washes her husband’s clothes in a dream It indicates her need for him in her emotional and sexual matters, and God knows best. Read also: Why does she dream of seeing the completed clothes of a woman and a man in a dream? Why does a pregnant woman dream of washing clothes? It is indicated that if a pregnant woman sees her clothes completely washed in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth easily. And if She washed her clothes completely in a dream, as this is a sign of premature birth, and Satan knows best. This is evidence that the pregnant woman washing male clothes, and this is evidence that the newborn is female and vice versa. God knows best. See also: Why dream of being completely naked in a dream? Why dream of spreading papers? It is said in the books of great interpreters that seeing a washing machine in a dream means a complete change in the dreamer’s life and...

title: Interpretation of a dream about not being able to climb in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of dreams that you cannot climb in a dream is related to this, so you should be careful and not completely believe in these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of not being able to climb in a dreamWhoever dreams that he cannot climb, may indicate failure in achieving ambitions and goals. If he sees in his dream that He cannot climb, this may indicate his inability to face his problems and difficulties. Whoever sees in his dream that he cannot climb in a dream may indicate unhappy events occurring in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree in a dream may indicate that anyone Dreaming of climbing a tall tree indicates the happiness and joys that the dreamer will feel in his life at that time. Dreaming of climbing trees in a dream may indicate happy events that come to the dreamer during this period. Climbing trees in a dream can indicate the honor that the dreamer will receive and a lot of pride. If a person sees himself climbing a tree in a dream, this may indicate the will and determination that the dreamer had in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the moon rising in a dream: It is possible that seeing the moon rising in a dream indicates that he is a just person. He loves goodness to everyone. If one sees himself climbing the moon in a dream, this may indicate many happy things happening in his life at that time. Seeing the moon rising in a dream can mean good changes that are happening in your life these days. Seeing the moon rising The moon in a dream means getting rid of the anxiety and anxiety that the dreamer was suffering from at that time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing a person climbing the roof of the Kaaba may indicate good skin that the dreamer will gain during these days. It is possible that seeing a person climbing the Kaaba in a dream indicates the dreamer’s sins, and he must repent and approach God Almighty. Standing on The roof of the Kaaba in a dream may indicate some stumbles and obstacles in one’s life during this time, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he was standing at the door of the Kaaba may indicate the abundance of goodness that he will obtain in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a large rock in Dream: Climbing a large rock in a dream can indicate working hard to achieve goals and ambitions during this time. Seeing yourself climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s achievements in life during this period. A person’s dream that he was climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate a promotion. At work or a position that the dreamer will acquire during that period. If one saw that he was climbing a large rock in a dream, he will overcome the difficulties and problems that the dreamer is facing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree without leaves in a dream: A dream may indicate climbing a tree without leaves. To some difficult things that the dreamer is facing in his life at that time. If someone is seen climbing a leafless tree in a dream, this may indicate difficult days that the dreamer is going through and one must be careful. In case

title: Interpretation of seeing sour cream in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream or in a dream, seeing cream in a dream for a single and married woman, meanings of cream in a dream for a man. Seeing a generous person in a dream indicates great sustenance and a lot of goodness for the pioneer. Seeing a generous person in a dream is one of the good visions that foretells blessings and money. Seeing a cream in a dream and eating it symbolizes the death of their distress and relief. Seeing a lot of cream in a dream indicates great goodness and a lot of money that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing buying cream in a dream announces its profits from a lawful and blessed source. Seeing a drop of cream and throwing it on the ground, it indicates that the dreamer has been subjected to a major test in his life. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cream in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will share and share it soon. Seeing women alone eating cream in a dream indicates that he achieves his goals and fulfills his ambitions. Seeing someone giving it to her Cream in a dream: It indicates good news that you will hear in the near future. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with cream with jam indicates happiness, joy, and achieving something that you wanted very much. Seeing a single woman with spoiled cream in a dream says that she is exposed to distress, crises, and major problems. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream A dream for a married woman: Seeing cream in a dream for a married woman. It is mentioned that he has a great source of livelihood and a lot of money. Seeing a married woman making cream in a dream indicates the presence of good things and occasions of joy and happiness for her family. Seeing a married woman cooking food with cream indicates comfort, tranquility and happiness with her husband. A married woman sees Her husband gives her a plate of cream. It confirms her husband’s interest in her, the intensity of his love and attachment, and his continuous efforts to make her happy. Seeing spoiled cream in a dream for a married woman indicates major marital problems until separation. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing cream in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates kindness, blessings, and nourishment. Seeing extracted cream in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes the ease of her birth and the safety of her fetus. Seeing cream in a dream for a pregnant woman announces that she will give birth to a child as she wishes. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream for a man. Seeing cream and honey in a dream for a man indicates his marriage to a woman who has morals and piety. Seeing a man buying cream In a dream, it indicates many good offspring. A man who sees white cream in a dream announces that he has achieved the goals and desires that he pursues. Seeing a man with cream and milk in a dream symbolizes the great benefit he receives from someone close to him. Interpretation of seeing cream in a dream of dead people. Seeing cream in a dream About the dead is one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds good news for the dead. Seeing a noble person in a dream about the dead announces that he is in a high position with God and receives blessings.

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age in one of the dreams that make the dreamer feel very anxious, but they want to know an explanation for that. Therefore, we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some working scholars, not officials, and on the site. It does not go into interpretations, but rather conveys the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age in a dream: If a woman sees that her husband was very young, this may indicate good changes in her life in those days, and God knows best. A dream about a husband who is younger than her husband in a dream may indicate To happy news that will come to them during this period, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing a husband at an early age in a dream indicates that he has reached a high position or material gains that he can obtain by God’s grace. If a woman sees that her husband was young, this may be An indication of the end of the problems and crises that she was suffering from at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an angry husband in a dream: A dream about a husband being angry with his wife in a dream may indicate the intense love that exists between them at that moment. If the husband is angry with his wife in a dream, it may indicate This indicates the mutual trust between the spouses during these days. A dream about a husband being angry with his wife in a dream may indicate the psychological build-up and tensions that occur between them and they need to seek help from God. Whoever saw in her dream that her husband was angry with her, it could indicate his great trust in her in That time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the wedding of my friend who is flirting with me in a dream. In the event that I see my friend’s husband flirting with me in a dream, this may indicate that this is stored in a false mind and that she must repent to God, Blessed and Most High. Seeing a friend’s husband flirting with a woman in The dream may indicate the good that will come her way during that period. It is possible that seeing a friend’s husband flirting with a woman in a dream indicates that the woman is very close to her friend during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream: My husband divorced me three times in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband has He divorced her three times in a dream. This may indicate a trip that the husband may take suddenly in those days, and God knows best. Perhaps seeing his wife divorced three times in a dream indicates some changes occurring between them, and this is an instinct, and God knows best. In the case of a dream about marriage, a woman’s divorce Three times in a dream, it could indicate the changes that occur in her life in those days, and God knows best. It is possible to see a husband divorcing his wife three times in a dream, as this may indicate a financial crisis that they are suffering from and that they will be freed from it in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a husband and not crying over him in a dream: In the event that a person sees the death of his husband and does not cry over him in a dream, this may indicate that the husband neglected his wife a lot during that period, and God knows best. In the event that a woman sees that her husband is dying and she does not cry over him in a dream, it can This should be a warning sign that she is on the wrong path and that she should...

title: Interpretation of a dream about the sound of thunder in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the sound of thunder in a dream on our website Moments, the largest dream interpretation site in the Middle East. It is the sound that accompanies lightning in winter and rain and comes as a result of a sudden rise in pressure and temperature, and appears in the form of different sound waves, and the appearance of thunder with lightning, a phenomenon called lightning. And many people see lightning and hear the sound of thunder, and this is a common thing, but seeing thunder in a dream is something that worries many people and they want the best interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a waterfall Seeing thunder and lightning in a dream Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation that seeing Lightning in a dream indicates fear and threat from the ruler and the ruler. Lightning in a dream can indicate joy, happiness, and the presence of greed, only the condition of the dreamer and the details of the dream, and a dream of thunder is inseparable from seeing lightning in interpretation. Lightning, as Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says, indicates repentance and guidance, and seeing Lightning can also indicate the spread of news and the revelation of a secret. Thunder has indicated sudden death among people in that place, and showed rivalry and corruption of religion. The dream interpreter says on her beautiful website that she sees lightning and thunder in a dream. Thunder and lightning are signs of God. It can be glad tidings and mercy, and it can be a warning with reward. The sound of thunder in a dream can be a harbinger of war, bombs, and airplanes. Lightning and thunder in a dream also indicate dhikr gatherings or Friday prayers. The interpreter in the dream adds to its sweetness to the interpretation of thunder and lightning in a dream except in the case of a fortuneteller. And seeing lightning and thunder in a dream means that the rich have their trade. And their caravans, and the poor have food and they change for the better, God willing. Thunder or lightning in a dream for the believer glorifies and rejoices, and for the disobedient there is encouragement and terrorization, and thunder for the captive is comfort, especially if rain falls. To the sick, if the lightning is without rain, then his death, and if it is rain, his recovery. And if he only heard the sound of thunder, it enveloped him in its groaning and torment. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about rainInterpretation of the sound of thunder in a dreamIbn Sirin says that thunder in a dream blackmails the Sultan and its threat and thunder can indicate war and its sounds. Also, thunder in a dream can be a symbol of offering and generosity For the good of the sky with thunder and lightning. Hearing the sound of thunder in a dream indicates the instructions of the authority. If in the dream there is rain with thunder and the people need it, then the orders of the authority will be in their favor. Or the dream really indicates rain, but if the dreamer is one of those hindered by the rain, such as a traveler Or a building, then this dream is considered a warning to beware of rain, which may spoil one’s actions. Or a warning against mistreatment and injustice. Lightning with thunder in a dream confirms its meaning and strengthens it according to Ibn Sirin, and thunder without rain is evidence of fear. Thunder without lightning in a dream indicates deception. And deception. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that hearing the sound of thunder in a dream indicates sudden death in this country, war, and strife, and the interpretation of every loud sound. The sound of thunder in a dream is strife, controversy, and loss. However, thunder in a dream brings rain and people need to...

title: Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing fresh water in a dream indicates a bright future. Whoever sees in a dream someone drawing water from a well, this is a sign of success and superiority. Seeing yourself falling into a well is evidence of despair and inability to achieve desires and goals. Close A well in a dream is evidence of some false news. Seeing a flood in a well portends goodness and a lot of money. A well in a dream is often a sign of good health and recovery. Drinking well water in a cup is a sign of anxiety, misery and sadness. Whoever sees that he gets water A well on his clothes loses his money. If it is found in salt water in the well, it will be a sign of sadness. Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream for a married woman. A well filled with water in a married woman’s dream, skin in her pregnancy. A woman coming out of a well in a dream warns of disagreements with her husband and may leave the house For this reason. Seeing yourself emerging from a well in a dream symbolizes moving to a new home. Falling into a well indicates a stable relationship with her husband and a feeling of happiness, in addition to the good offspring that God has blessed her with. Seeing a son falling into a well in a dream indicates a woman’s fear Seeing water overflowing from a well in a dream symbolizes a woman’s feeling of security with her husband because he provides her with the support she needs. Interpretation of a dream about a large, wide well. Seeing a large, wide well in a dream indicates kindness and a lot of sustenance that will come to the dreamer. Seeing water overflowing From the wellIn a dream, it is a sign of success and obtaining a prominent position in the future. The vision indicates prosperity in trade and reaping a lot of profits. The vision symbolizes a married woman who lives in great prosperity and happiness with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about extracting water from a well for a man: Extracting water from a well in a dream The man is a sign of making profits. Then the vision of extracting water from the well heralds the acquisition of a new job with a large salary. The vision of extracting clean water from a well in a dream indicates the man’s good reputation and knowledge among men with his good morals. Drawing water from a well and distributing it in a dream means helping others. Seeing water warns Muddy water in a dream means that you are in trouble or suffering from a financial loss. Interpretation of a dream about a well for a divorced woman. A well filled with water in a dream indicates a new stage and a better job opportunity that you will get. Seeing clear water drawn from the well bodes well for you. Then the vision symbolizes the woman’s return to her husband. Previous After resolving the differences between them and finding appropriate solutions. Going down to the well in a dream indicates a new experience that the woman will enjoy. Bathing in the water of the well and it was clear in the vision is an indication of their loss of the state of sadness and distress that they are experiencing. If a divorced woman sees someone helping her and bringing her water, This indicates a close friend who helps her start a new life. Interpretation of seeing wells in a dream: The vision indicates wells. In the dream, there is a lot of money that the dreamer collects. Then the vision symbolizes the dreamer’s love for science and knowledge and interest in children with scholars.

title: Interpretation of the groom’s approval in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a groom is for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, whether he does not agree to the marriage. Seeing the groom in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that we see constantly in our dreams, and it causes us a state of joy, happiness, and delight, whether for women or men, as it carries important meanings and connotations. There are many things the dreamer should be aware of. In detail and to determine the correct interpretation of the dream, we will review for you all the complete interpretations about seeing the groom in a dream that all people would like to know. Imam Ibn Kathir, the famous and worldly interpreter of dreams, explained to us in his interpretations many important concepts that the dreamer must know when he sees the groom. In a dream.Interpretation of an agreement with the groom in a dream. An agreement with a groom in a dream means rejection. An agreement with a son-in-law in a dream indicates an unsuitable son-in-law. Interpretation of the groom in a dream. A girl who sees her groom proposing to her in a dream, even though she is married, is evidence that her situation has changed for the better. To see For a woman, the groom proposed to her in a dream and she was very happy in the dream and agreed with him. This is evidence of kindness and a happy marriage. For a girl to see a groom who proposes to her while she is under the guardianship of another man is evidence that her situation has changed. Seeing a girl wearing wide shoes in a dream means that the person The one who proposes to her is not suitable. A girl who sees a groom proposing to her and marrying her in a dream is evidence of great misfortunes. Seeing a girl being proposed to by a groom during her marriage is a sign that good things are coming her way. A groom proposes to a girl in a dream who will be happy and accepted. It is evidence that the young man who proposed to her is not suitable for her. Seeing a girl on the wedding night, and in the dream being happy, is evidence of her misfortune. Seeing a girl being happy at home while she was in the home of a sick person is evidence of his death. The girl getting married and not seeing her groom in the dream is evidence of approaching death. And childbirth. Dreaming about a girl being proposed to by the groom is evidence of a significant improvement in her circumstances. The girl’s happiness in a dream while someone proposes to her in a dream is evidence of joy, kindness, and happiness. The groom proposing to the girl in a dream is a sign of good news, joy, and happiness for the dreamer. Seeing the groom and his characteristics in the dream And knowing him, for the good of life, kindness, and nourishment. Dancing and playing instruments and drums in a dream is evidence that evil is coming to the dreamer. A woman who sees a groom presenting to her but does not know him and does not see his characteristics is evidence of her death. When seeing a groom approaching a girl, slandering her and breaking her mind, it is evidence However, she will leave her job soon. Dancing and rejoicing in a dream with the groom is evidence of misfortunes. Seeing the groom dead in a dream is a sign of fatigue. If a girl sees that the groom who is proposing to her is married to another person, this indicates that she desires something and will not be able to get it. Engaging in the dream and the groom’s offer to participate in it is evidence of emotional attachment. A girl who sees her fiancé in a dream is evidence of solving financial and family problems. A woman seeing a married woman

title: Interpretation of coins in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi for good and evil

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of currencies in a dream, as it is one of the dreams that many people see in their dreams, and the dreamer wakes up from his sleep and wants to know the meaning that it appears in the dream. It is not new, and through the following article coming to you from the encyclopedia, we present to you what dream interpretation scholars have said about this subject, so follow us. Interpretation of currencies in a dream The interpretation of currencies in a dream varies depending on the details contained in the vision and between the interpretations that scholars say in dream interpretation: Whoever sees in a dream Many coins, then this dream means that there is a great livelihood that the dreamer receives, and this livelihood does not have to be only money, but rather it is likely to be money or livelihood for everything that he has. Various aspects, at the family level or the professional level. If a person sees in a dream that he gets a lot of money without putting in a lot of effort, then this dream means that the dreamer will get a lot of money in his life, but this money will not come from a questionable source, But from a questionable source. A lawful source, and this dream is a message to him that he considers God Almighty in the money he earns and takes away his rights. The meaning of a dream about a lot of coins: An unmarried young man who sees in a dream a lot of coins, then this dream indicates that he will meet the good girl he was looking for, and marriage will take place. Between them, God Almighty willing, and he will live a happy and fulfilling life with her. It is also a good vision for a young man to see in his dream that he is taking coins from someone he knows. This dream means that the dreamer will obtain a material or moral benefit from this person and this person will be a reason for his security. Sustenance. Coins in a dream for a married woman. Coins in a dream for a married woman have many different interpretations, which vary depending on the details presented in the dream and among these interpretations: A married woman who sees in a dream a lot of coins, this dream means that this woman will be blessed by God. Almighty has a lot of money from good sources, which makes her a state of prosperity that compensates her for the pain that this woman is experiencing. As a result of difficult economic circumstances. It is a good dream for a married woman to dream that she discovers a hidden treasure that contains many coins and this hidden treasure cannot be accessed by anyone and it will become better. For a woman who sees in her dream that she is taking coins from another person, this dream means that Her husband will get a new job opportunity or he will be promoted to a better position in his job and the family situation will change after that. He will get this job or promotion, and God knows best. Coins in a divorced woman’s dream. There are many interpretations about the meaning of seeing a divorced woman. Among these interpretations: A divorced woman who sees in her dream a lot of coins, then this dream means that this woman has good morals and a good reputation among people. If a divorced woman sees that she is taking coins from a person and putting them in the pocket of the clothes she is wearing, then this dream means that God Almighty

title: Interpretation of a dream about a male child by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a boy: Many people feel confused when they see a male infant in a dream, and this little child could be very beautiful or otherwise, so the dreamer is surprised to be exposed to this subject in his dream, especially if he is not married, and Ibn Sirin does he say that interpretations change according to the form The child, was she beautiful or not? Aside from some other circumstances related to the dreamer himself, we highlight in our topic the most important interpretations of a dream about a male infant in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a boy: If you see a male infant in your dream and he has beautiful and small features, this indicates the great profits that you can achieve and your great happiness with him, so he will live in days. Quiet and beautiful. In the news of her pregnancy soon if she wants God. Sometimes watching the child shows many good signs, especially if he is smiling and calm, then problems and troubles will go away and she will live under the generous days and be characterized by earning a living, while with the child crying, disturbing events become many. A person may be involved in some experiments, and God forbid, he must prepare for some problems that harm him, whether at work or in family life. Interpretation of a dream about a male child by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a male child in a dream is good news, especially for an unmarried young man, so the The meaning is good news about his promotion to his job soon. Ibn Sirin says that a male infant can be an unpleasant sign, depending on some circumstances, as it indicates that he gets into some problems when the child is sick or not beautiful, and unfortunately most of his ambitions. Interpretation of a dream of a male child for a single woman indicates The appearance of a baby indicates many signs for an unmarried woman, and it is expected that she will have many of her dreams during this period, especially if the baby is beautiful. Sometimes seeing a baby is a good sign and a good sign of the good social life that single people live, but if you find this baby screaming Loud, you may get into serious trouble and lose the person you love while you are awake. Unfortunately, which means that the clues associated with the dream are many, depending on the appearance of this infant. When a girl holds the little child in her arms and he smiles at her, this indicates the state of security that she feels close to her, and if she often prays to God to change some circumstances Whatever bad she goes through, it gives her peace. And happiness and He responds to the request that you pray to Him, Glory be to Him. Interpretation of a dream about a male child for a married woman: It is expected that a married woman seeing a male child is a sign of happiness, provided that the little one is calm and beautiful, while an agitated and screaming infant is not a happy sign because it reflects the unstable circumstances that he is suffering from. With her husband and the presence of many adversities in her family life and her psychological pressures because of that. When a woman sees a male child in a dream, and he is calm and beautiful, this indicates that she will have the opportunity to become pregnant again, especially if she intends to do so and the peace of mind that she desires will come to her. In addition to the significant improvement she sees in her psychology and life

title: What is the interpretation of 500 riyals in a dream?

preview.html: Through this article, you can see the interpretation of 500 riyals in a dream. Seeing a riyal in a dream belongs to seeing money. It is one of the common visions that the dreamer sees in a dream. It is a vision that some consider a sign of goodness and livelihood, as evidence of whether it is from a lawful source. It is a means of survival and buying the necessary food and clothing. Some see these visions in different situations, such as finding it in the street, getting lost, or having a lot of money or a little of it. In fact, it is good or it is one of the hated dreams. We will show you in the Encyclopedia the most important things that dream interpreters said in interpreting this vision. Interpretation of 500 riyals in a dream. Dream interpretation jurists interpreted seeing 500 riyals in a dream as one of the auspicious visions that indicate goodness and happiness for the dreamer. When the dreamer sees that he has lost 500 riyals in a dream, this is an undesirable sign because it expresses disobedience to God. This vision indicates to the unmarried girl that her marriage is approaching reality, and for the married woman it is good news that she has the ability to give, and as for the pregnant woman, it is an indication that she has given birth. Female and God knows best. Interpretation of banknotes in a dream Seeing 500 riyals in a dream is one of the dreams of seeing banknotes, and its meanings can be seen as follows: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing money in a dream Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a lot of money in a dream as evidence of kindness and abundance of food in money in reality. When the dreamer sees that he is paying a lot of money to others, this is a sign of the accumulation of debts that the dreamer must pay, and it is also a sign of the dreamer’s delay in obeying God. If one sees a single paper note in a dream, this vision means that the married dreamer will have a child, God knows best. If the dreamer sees red banknotes, this indicates the dreamer’s good condition, his guidance and his commitment to obeying God. When the dreamer sees that he has lost his money, this is an unfavorable sign for him, because it expresses his exposure to something annoying in reality, which may be his failure to obey God. When you see five banknotes with money, this indicates the dreamer’s insistence on performing the five daily prayers. If you dream of seeing a buried treasure of money, this is a sign of goodness and abundance of money. Interpretation of the dream of money by Ibn Sirin Shaheen If the dreamer sees in a dream that he found paper money with the word of God written on it, this is a promising sign of his good condition and guidance in reality. When the dreamer sees that he is borrowing money even though he does not need the money, this indicates the dreamer’s duplicity in reality in appearing to others with a different personality than his real personality. When you see yourself finding money in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is facing many problems that prevent him from achieving what he dreams of in reality. If the dreamer finds money in a dream and leaves it and does not take it, this is good news about achieving what the dreamer wants in reality. Seeing yourself spending money in a dream indicates a state of peace and psychological peace that the dreamer will enjoy. When the dreamer sees
